title: A Depression

description: Episode of Series "Disordered Mind". The case of a young man shown during and after recovery from a severe depression. The patient attempted to kill his wife, son and himself. He is interviewed by a psychiatrist and the prognosis and treatment are discussed. After a course of drugs and psychiatric treatment there is a remarkable improvement.
